title: Smooth Jazz Lines: Spectral High Jersey
content:
There arenâ€™t many MTB jerseys that pique our interests but anytime Smooth Jazz Lines puts one out, the vibes really resonate over here. This morning SJL just released its Spectral High Jersey in both short ($75) and long sleeves ($85) for men and women. This jersey has a message, of which you can see at Smooth Jazz Lines.

The post Smooth Jazz Lines: Spectral High Jersey appeared first on The Radavist.
